title: VS 2015 PCL build breaks when upgrading from 2017 RC3 to D15Rel/26129 (MSB5016)
body:
1. Create a new PCL project in VS 2015 (or skip ahead to step 5 and use the attached project)
2. Add a second PCL project to the solution which references the first
3. Build it in 2015 - works fine
4. Reopen the project in 2017, and clean the project
5. Try to build

Project:
[PCLForNet46AndCore.zip](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/files/746165/PCLForNet46AndCore.zip)

Result:
1>C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets(1556,5): error MSB5016: The name ".NETStandard,Version" contains an invalid character ".".  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Enterprise\MSBuild\15.0\Bin\Microsoft.Common.CurrentVersion.targets

This works with the RC3 build.

Which is raised at this stack:

From the verbose build logs, that string comes from:
```
1>NuGetTargetMoniker = .NETPlatform,Version=v5.0;.NETStandard,Version=v1.0;.NETStandard,Version=v1.1;.NETStandard,Version=v1.2;.NETStandard,Version=v1.3;.NETStandard,Version=v1.4;.NETStandard,Version=v1.5;.NETStandard,Version=v1.6
...
Set Property: ReferringTargetFrameworkForProjectReferences=.NETPlatform,Version=v5.0;.NETStandard,Version=v1.0;.NETStandard,Version=v1.1;.NETStandard,Version=v1.2;.NETStandard,Version=v1.3;.NETStandard,Version=v1.4;.NETStandard,Version=v1.5;.NETStandard,Version=v1.6
1>Using "MSBuild" task from assembly "Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core, Version=15.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a".
1>Task "MSBuild" (TaskId:9)
1>  Task Parameter:Projects=..\PCLForNet46AndCore.csproj (TaskId:9)
1>  Task Parameter:Targets=GetTargetFrameworkProperties (TaskId:9)
1>  Task Parameter:BuildInParallel=True (TaskId:9)
1>  Task Parameter:
1>      Properties=
1>          Configuration=Debug
1>          Platform=AnyCPU
1>          ReferringTargetFramework=.NETPlatform,Version=v5.0
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.0
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.1
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.2
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.3
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.4
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.5
1>          .NETStandard,Version=v1.6 (TaskId:9)
```

nodes.body:
Should be fixed by https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/1644. Dupe of internal bug [377419](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/DevDiv/_workitems?id=377419&_a=edit), but let's keep this one open for tracking.

Thanks for the report @gregg-miskelly.
